title: LMPD: Suspected drunk driver tells officer, 'let me please you,' offers $10,000 for freedom
text: LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) - A suspected drunk driver is accused of trying to bribe a police officer into letting her go. According to an arrest report, Jennifer L. Holloway, 28, was found asleep at the wheel of her car while the motor was running in the parking lot of Circle K at 9401 Westport Road shortly after midnight Wednesday morning. Police said she failed a field sobriety test. The arrest report states that while in custody, Holloway offered an officer money, community service and said, "let me please you" in an effort to be set free. Later, according to the report, Holloway offered the officer $10,000 to let her go. Holloway is charged with bribery of a public servant and operating a motor vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs. Copyright 2013 WAVE 3 News. All rights reserved.
